scripts.bundle:ios: rimraf bundle/ios/* && node createBundleFolder.js && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./bundle/ios/index.bundle --assets-dest ./bundle/ios
scripts.bundle:android: rimraf bundle/android/* && node createBundleFolder.js && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./bundle/android/index.bundle --assets-dest ./bundle/android
